metadata.title: CVE-2019-20024 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in image_buffer_resize infromsixel.c in libsixel before 1.8.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.6-1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.6-1
libsixel1 - 1.8.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
